ngiemboon: Alínɔ̀ɔn la mag, epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ntsèm pie é laa ssé, é gʉa ne tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ mie é tsɛ̀ɛ láʼa Yúndà. Ńkúu wó, éshʉ́ate metǒon mie mé la pʉʼʉ ńtÿɔ́g tÿɔ́g, ḿbwɔ́ʼte mentóon mejʉʼʉ ssé mɔ́b, ńtág mejʉʼ ssé, mbɔɔ mejʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ mɔ́b. Pɔ́ la gÿo púʼu tsɛ̀ɛ mepàga láʼ Yúndà ntsèm, mbɔɔ me pʉ̀a ngẅɛ̀te Mbɛŋjÿamɛŋ, mbɔɔ me Efalayîm, ńgÿo me Manase. Afʉ̀ʼ kuʼ, pɔ́ piŋ né tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ mɔ́b, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ piŋ né mbʉ̀a yé.
en: When all this was completed, all Israel who had attended went out to the cities of Judah and broke up the sacred pillars, chopped down the Asherah poles, and tore down the high places and altars   throughout Judah and Benjamin, as well as in Ephraim and Manasseh, to the last one.  # 31:1 Lit Manasseh, until finishing Then all the Israelites returned to their cities, each to his own possession.

ngiemboon: Ezekiyásè la gíŋe ńcúʼte menùɔ panuŋepwɔʼ lâ pʉ̀a Lěvî. Ńnáa fàʼ ye wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ, á tsɛ̀ɛ yé nùɔ. Á laa ndá Ssé, panuŋepwɔʼ lâ pʉ̀a Lěvî gẅiin nò na shúm pwɔʼ gẅie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm, mbɔɔ na pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè. Pɔ́ la gíŋ ńgẅiin léfaʼa mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, é síe yé ńzɔb ńguʼte yé.
en: Hezekiah reestablished the divisions   of the priests and Levites for the burnt offerings and fellowship offerings, for ministry, for giving thanks, and for praise in the gates of the camp of the Lord,  # 31:2 1Ch 23:28–31 each division corresponding to his service among the priests and Levites.

ngiemboon: Afùɔ la náa tsɔ́ gwǒŋ na shúm sé lélɔg ńjú shúm pwɔʼ gẅie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm, á mbaʼámbaʼ pɔ́ ncwònzém, mbɔɔ pwɔʼ gẅie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm gẅie mé ge ná lyɛʼɛ́ nzse, ńgÿo gẅie mé ge ná lyɛ̌ʼ gie saŋ sẅé sǎʼ mbɔɔ na metsɔ́ melyɛʼɛ́ línɔ̀ɔn, á gwɔ́ páʼ lepʉ̌ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la ne ńzɛ́te.
en: The king contributed   from his own possessions  # 31:3 2Ch 35:7 for the regular morning and evening burnt offerings, the burnt offerings of the Sabbaths, of the New Moons, and of the appointed feasts, as written in the law of the Lord.  # 31:3 Nm 28

ngiemboon: Afùɔ la tsẅii mbwó patsẅé Yelúzálèm ntsèm ngie pɔ́ náa mmó gie áa ye panuŋepwɔʼ, mbɔɔ ye pʉ̀a Lěvî, à cʉa púʼu, pɔ́ lɔgɔ pyennɛ́, éfaʼa mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a páʼ lepʉ̌ ne ńzɛ́te.
en: He told the people who lived in Jerusalem to give a contribution   for the priests and Levites so that they could devote their energy to the law of the Lord.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ la gwɔ́ tà ńzsé sɛ̌ lepʉ̌, ńdɔg ntwó shúm sie éfóo menkáʼ, ńtó tà é gyɔ́ɔn: yɔɔn laa ngesáŋ ntsíŋ, mɔɔn gwɔ́ melùʼ, mɔɔn gwɔ́ mevɛ́, mɔɔn gwɔ́ melwòŋwáʼ, ńgÿo tsɔ́ shúm sie é lɔ́ɔn fóo menkáʼ pɔ́b. Pɔ́ lɔ́ɔn ńgíŋe ńgabte shúm nkáʼ sɔ́b ntsèm nzsè legém, ńdɔgɔ tàʼ nzsè ńtóo.
en: When the word spread, the Israelites gave liberally of the best of the grain, new wine, fresh oil, honey, and of all the produce of the field, and they brought in an abundance, a tenth   of everything.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ pe shÿó kwóŋ ńgÿo pʉ̀a Yúndà pie é lɔ́ɔn ńtsẅé tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ Yúndà la ná yɔ́b tàʼ nzsè na menɔ̀ɔn pɔ́b nzsè legém, é mefòŋ pâ menjʉ̀njÿò. Mbɔɔ shúm pwɔʼ sie ée se Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé yɔ́b. Á gwɔ́ púʼu, mé gẅiin shúm menzsè menzsè tà é gyɔ́ɔn.
en: As for the Israelites and Judahites who lived in the cities of Judah, they also brought a tenth of the herds and flocks, and a tenth of the dedicated things that were consecrated to the Lord their God.   They gathered them into large piles.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a la zye lécúʼte metsɔ́ menzsè shúm na saŋ tá na ngùʼu láʼ, ńdáʼa ḿmaga na saŋ sɔɔnmbʉ́a.
en: In the third month they began building up the piles, and they finished in the seventh month.

ngiemboon: Afùɔ Ezekiyásè pâ mekěm la tó ńgyá shúm ŋwɛ́ menzsè menzsè púʼu, ńná ndǎg mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ḿbiŋ néŋ mbʉ́lè na pa Ésàlayɛ, é pʉ̀a pé.
en: When Hezekiah and his officials came and viewed the piles, they blessed the Lord and his people Israel.

ngiemboon: Afùɔ la zɛ́te nò mbwó panuŋepwɔʼ mbɔɔ mbwó pʉ̀a Lěvî, ńtí sɛ̌ shúm menzsè menzsè.
en: Hezekiah asked the priests and Levites about the piles.

ngiemboon: Azaliya gẅie aa nùŋepwɔʼ welÿò, ńgwɔ́ na tsìŋendá Sandɔg, á tsɔ́ʼ né yé ngie: «Tà fó páʼ epʉ̀a la zye lélɔg shúm sie pɔ́ píi na sie pɔ́ lagá nkáʼ, ńtóo ndá Ssé, peg gẅiin shúm sie peg ge pfɛ́, ḿbiŋ ḿpfɛ́ɛ tà zẅɛ́ɛ, tà pfwɔ̀ʼ gíŋ ḿvwɔʼɔ tà ńgyɔ́ɔn, mélàʼmie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ka něŋ mbʉ́lè na láʼ yé, apfwɔ̀ʼ yɔɔn ńcúʼte jʉʼɔɔn.»
en: The chief priest Azariah, of the household of Zadok,   answered him, “Since they began bringing the offering to the Lord’s temple, we have been eating and are satisfied and there is plenty left over because the Lord has blessed his people; this abundance is what is left over.”  # 31:10 Mal 3:10

ngiemboon: Afùɔ Ezekiyásè la tsẅi ngie mé táŋte melûmdá mie mé ge néŋ sɛ̌ pfwɔ̀ʼ shúm wó, á ngʉ̀ŋe ndá Cʉ̀apʉ̀a. Mé la táŋte tà é pum,
en: Hezekiah told them to prepare chambers   in the Lord’s temple, and they prepared them.

ngiemboon: epʉ̀a lɔg shúm sie é fǒ nkáʼ ńtóo fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm, mbɔɔ shúm pwɔʼ sie mé ge náa mbwó Ssé. Konania gẅie aa nyìŋ Lěvî lɔ̌ɔn ḿbyɛ́bɛ sɛ̌ shúm, afɛ̌ we Shʉmeyi gwɔ́ nkẅèpwó we.
en: The offering, the tenth, and the dedicated things were brought faithfully. Conaniah the Levite was the officer in charge of them, and his brother Shimei was second.

ngiemboon: Afùɔ Ezekiyásè pɔ́ Azaliya gẅie aa nùŋepwɔʼ welÿò, ńgíŋ ńgẅiin nò na ndá Ssé la tsẅi ngie Konania pɔ́ Shʉmeyi e gwɔ́ patyé twómvfò na palíe mefàʼ. Mezíŋ palíe mefàʼ ŋwɛ́ e mɔɔn: Wɔɔn laa Yehiyɛ, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Azazia, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Nahad, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Asayɛ, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Yelimɔd, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Yozambad, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Eliyɛɛ, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Esemakia, wɔɔn gwɔ́ Mahad, ńgÿo Mbenaya.
en: Jehiel, Azaziah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismachiah, Mahath, and Benaiah were deputies under the authority of Conaniah and his brother Shimei by appointment of King Hezekiah and of Azariah the chief official of God’s temple.

ngiemboon: Kole nyìŋ Lěvî, ńgwɔ́ míŋ Yimna lɔ̌ɔn ḿbyɛ́bɛ ncwò ndá we shÿó sáʼném. À lɔ̌ɔn ńgẅiin lékẅé shúm nanǎ sie me náa mbwó Ssé. Ḿbiŋe ńgabte shúm sie mé leʼe, é gwɔ́ se Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, tà mbɔɔ shúm pwɔʼ se ndʉalʉ̌a.
en: Kore son of Imnah the Levite, the keeper of the East Gate, was over the freewill offerings to God to distribute the contribution to the Lord and the consecrated things.

ngiemboon: Á la gʉa na metÿǒsoŋ mie panuŋepwɔʼ ée wó, mé tÿɔ́gɔ Éndèn, ńtÿɔ́gɔ Miniami, ńtÿɔ́gɔ Yǒonshûa, ńtÿɔ́gɔ Shÿemaya, ńtÿɔ́gɔ Amalia, ńgÿo Shÿekania. Yɔɔn mbàŋa lɔ́ɔn ńdɔgɔ pyennɛ́, ńgabte shúm léjÿó mbwó petsɔ́ panuŋepwɔʼ pie é nyé ńgwɔ́ penkʉ́, mbɔɔ pie é zẅǐŋ, á na páʼ nùɔ yɔ́b áa púʼu.
en: Eden,   Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah, and Shecaniah in the cities of the priests  # 31:15 Jos 21:9–19 were to distribute it faithfully under his authority to their brothers by divisions, whether large or small.

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌ɔn ńnáa mbwó pʉ̀a pie mé la sáŋa wɔ́b, tà mbɔɔ mbwó púɔ mbàŋa pie é gẅiin ngùʼ tá. Pɔ́ lɔ́ɔn ńgíŋe ńnáa se pʉ̀a pie é lɔ́ɔn ńkúu ndá Cʉ̀apʉ̀a lyɛ̌ʼ ntsèm, éfaʼa fàʼ yɔ́b, á na páʼ ayɔ́b nùɔ áa púʼu.
en: In addition, they distributed it to males registered by genealogy three  ,# 31:16 1Ch 23:3 years old and above; to all who would enter the Lord’s temple for their daily duty,  # 31:16 Ezr 3:4 for their service in their responsibilities according to their divisions.

ngiemboon: Mé lɔ́ɔn ńŋweʼe mezíŋ panuŋepwɔʼ, á na páʼ metsìŋendá mɔ́b ée púʼu, ńgʉa na pʉ̀a Lěvî, mbà mé lɔ́ɔn ńzyete na ngùʼ móm mbʉ́a, ńdɔgɔ ńgee lé mvfò, á lésáŋa wɔ́b, páʼ yɔ́b ntí fàʼ nǎ púʼu, mbɔɔ na páʼ yɔ́b nùɔ áa púʼu.
en: They distributed also to those recorded by genealogy of the priests by their ancestral families   and the Levites twenty years old and above,  # 31:17 1Ch 23:24 by their responsibilities in their divisions;

ngiemboon: Mezíŋ mɔ́b mbɔɔ mé pʉ̀a tsìŋendá yɔ́b laa tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwàʼne, pɔɔn laa panzwě, pɔɔn gwɔ́ penkʉ́ pembàŋa mbɔɔ pepanzwě, ńgÿo pʉ̀a metsèm pie é laa lejʉ́ŋ pɔ́b, pɔ́ la gẅiin lépfɛ́ shúm pwɔʼ sie ée se Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: to those registered by genealogy #— #with all their dependents, wives, sons, and daughters #— #of the whole assembly (for they had faithfully consecrated themselves as holy);

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ panuŋepwɔʼ na tsìŋendá Áloŋ lɔ́ɔn ńtsẅé tsɛ̀ɛ menkáʼ mie ée na menkwɔʼɔ́ metÿǒsoŋ panuŋepwɔʼ. Á laa tsɛ̀ɛ yɛ̌ tÿǒsoŋ wɔ́ɔ, epʉ̀a pie mé la tsɔ́ʼ páʼ pɔ́ ge gab sɔ́b shúm léjÿó, é gwɔ́ wó, mbɔɔ se pʉ̀a Lěvî pie mezíŋ mɔ́b é laa tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwàʼne.
en: and to the descendants of Aaron, the priests, in the common fields of their cities,   in each and every city. There were men who were registered by name  # 31:19 2Ch 31:12–15 to distribute a portion to every male among the priests and to every Levite recorded by genealogy.

ngiemboon: Wɔɔn lɔg ńgwɔ́ páʼ Ezekiyásè la gÿo púʼu, á tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Yúndà ntsèm. À la gẅiin pyennɛ́, ńgÿo mmó gie áa mbòŋ, ńgwɔ́ nénʉ́ mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé ye.
en: Hezekiah did this throughout all Judah. He did what was good and upright and true before the Lord his God.

ngiemboon: À la faʼ mefàʼ ndá Ssé tɛʼ, ńdɔg ńgÿo mé giŋe na lepʉ̌, mbɔɔ na mentÿɔgɔ́ Ssé. À la gÿo páʼɔɔn, éfaʼ Ssé né ngwòŋ ntʉ́m wé ntsèm, ńgÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ wɔ́ɔ, á pum pum.
en: He was diligent in every deed that he began in the service of God’s temple, in the instruction and the commands, in order to seek his God, and he prospered.
